name: anju-js
description: AnjuJS is a lightweight and highly efficient encryption library designed to ensure secure password management without compromising performance. Its flexible architecture allows for customizable security parameters, including salt usage, adaptive encryption configurations, and a signature key that strengthens data integrity between the frontend and backend. With a focus on speed, security, and seamless integration, anjuJS provides a robust solution for developers seeking precise control over credential protection and sensitive data encryption.
